#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define M 10000000
using namespace std;
int s[10000001]={0};
vector<int> primes;
void seive(){
	s[0]=1; s[1]=1;
	for(int i=2; i<=M; i++){
		if(s[i]==0){
			primes.push_back(i);
			for(int j=2; i*j<=M; j++) s[i*j]=1;
		}
	}
}
int bin_search(int key){
    int l=0;
    int r=primes.size();
    while(r-l>1){
        int mid=l+ (r-l)/2;
        if(primes[mid]>key){
            r=mid;
        }
        else{
            l=mid;
        }
    }
    return r;
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    seive();
    while(t--){
        int n; cin>>n;
        if(s[n]){
            cout<<-1<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        else{
            int pos=bin_search(n);
            cout<<pos<<endl;
        }
    }
}
